name: Is Anyone There?
description:
Is Anyone There? is a narrative-driven puzzle game tasking you with servicing relay communications throughout space. Take a call, complete a minigame (or fail it) and see how the customer reacts! In between calls you can explore your station! Feel like ignoring a call? Go ahead! Just don't go complaining to your supervisor when your customer gets upset!

A game by Bryce Evans, Neil Jones and Mars Ashton.
